data.description: Interface to HPUX's LVM volume manager
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Only works with HPUX's LVM impletmentation so putting it with
    Ioscan seemed right. Its an extremely useful program when used with
    the included cgi for HPUX disk capacity planning and overview. More
    useful for system admins of large scale servers with lots of disks.
    I've been using it and updating it for years. I've also attempted to
    post it 3 other times w/o success. :-)
